name: FABERGENT
overview:
Fabergent is an IT consulting and technology services company. Committed to delivering innovation, Fabergent collaborates with its clients to help them become high-performance businesses. Fabergent can mobilize the right people, skills and technologies to help clients improve their performance. We provide solutions for a dynamic environment where business and technology strategies converge.

We work with large global corporations and new generation technology companies to build new products or services and to implement prudent business and technology strategies in today’s dynamic digital environment.

Using global resources, we deliver high quality technology while still managing to save clients money.
